languages.text: "Думаю, вы правы, Ваша Светлость. Разум покидает меня, не дает удержаться — даже сейчас я вижу у вас за спиной топи, где сгинул Тацит..." {n}Лицо мужчины превращается в маску боли и скорби, а по телу прокатывается сильнейший спазм.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Думаю, вы правы, Ваша Светлость. Разум покидает меня, не дает удержаться — даже сейчас я вижу у вас за спиной топи, где сгинул Тацит..." {n}Лицо мужчины превращается в маску боли и скорби, а по телу прокатывается сильнейший спазм.{/n}

languages.text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Думаю, вы правы, Ваша Светлость. Разум покидает меня, не дает удержаться — даже сейчас я вижу у вас за спиной топи, где сгинул Тацит..." {n}Лицо мужчины превращается в маску боли и скорби, а по телу прокатывается сильнейший спазм.{/n}

"I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

"I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

"I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうかもしれません、陛下。理性を失い、まともに考えることもできません…今でもあなたのすぐ後ろに、タチタスが消えた湿地が見えます…」{n}男は苦痛と悲しみに顔を歪め、強烈な痙攣が彼の身体を襲った。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうかもしれません、陛下。理性を失い、まともに考えることもできません――今でもあなたのすぐ後ろに、タチタスが消えた湿地が見えます…」{n}男は苦痛と悲しみに顔を歪め、強烈な痙攣が彼の身体を襲った。{/n}

languages.text: “我想您说得对，大人。理智已经弃我而去，我撑不下去了。即便是现在，我依然能在您身后看到塔西佗消失的那片沼泽……”{n}那人的脸被痛苦与悲伤所扭曲，他的身体猛地痉挛了一下。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我想您说得对，大人。理智已经弃我而去，我撑不下去了。即便是现在，我依然能在您身后看到塔西佗消失的那片沼泽……”{n}那人的脸被痛苦与悲伤所扭曲，他的身体猛地痉挛了一下。{/n}

languages.text: «Creo que tiene razón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La razón me ha abandonado y no puedo resistir. Incluso ahora, veo la ciénaga donde Tacitus desapareció detrás de usted...». {n}El rostro del hombre se transforma en una máscara de dolor y pesar y una poderosa sacudida recorre su cuerpo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Creo que tiene razón, mi{mf|lord|lady}. La razón me ha abandonado y no puedo resistir. Incluso ahora, veo la ciénaga donde Tacitus desapareció detrás de usted...». {n}El rostro del hombre se transforma en una máscara de dolor y pesar y una poderosa sacudida recorre su cuerpo.{/n}

languages.text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. La raison m'échappe, je ne peux pas résister... Encore maintenant, je vois le marécage où Tacitus a disparu juste derrière vous... » {n}Une grimace de douleur et de chagrin déforme le visage de l'homme et son corps tout entier est secoué par un puissant spasme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « En effet, Votre Seigneurie. La raison m'échappe, je ne peux pas résister... Encore maintenant, je vois le marécage où Tacitus a disparu juste derrière vous... » {n}Une grimace de douleur et de chagrin déforme le visage de l'homme et son corps tout entier est secoué par un puissant spasme.{/n}

languages.text: "Da habt Ihr wohl recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich war nicht bei Vernunft, bin es noch nicht – selbst jetzt sehe ich direkt hinter Euch den Sumpf, in dem Tacitus verschwunden ist ..." {n}Das Gesicht des Mannes verzerrt sich vor Schmerz und Trauer, und ein starker Krampf durchzuckt seinen Körper.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Da habt Ihr wohl recht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich war nicht bei Vernunft, bin es noch nicht – selbst jetzt sehe ich direkt hinter Euch den Sumpf, in dem Tacitus verschwunden ist ..." {n}Das Gesicht des Mannes verzerrt sich vor Schmerz und Trauer, und ein starker Krampf durchzuckt seinen Körper.{/n}

languages.text: "Sanıyorum haklısınız {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Sağduyum beni terk etti. Şu an bile dayanamıyorum, hemen arkanızda Tacitus'un yok olduğu çalılığı görebiliyorum." {n}Adamın yüzü acı ve matemle çarpılıyor, şiddetli spazmlar bedenini ele geçiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I think you're right, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. Reason has fled me, I can't hold out — even now, I can see the marsh where Tacitus vanished just behind you..." {n}The man's face twists in a mask of pain and grief, and a powerful spasm wracks his body.{/n}
